english.segment1: I walk the line. Leave it all behind. I've been waiting forever. Lets go back in time. When I could read your mind. Still I've been waiting
english.segment2: It took the seasons going by. To know its not my fault
english.segment3: I tried to be perfect, tried to be honest. Tried to be everything that you ever wanted. I tried to be stronger, tried to be smarter. Tried to be everything but you
english.segment4: Its been so long. Since you've been home. I used to wait up forever. I used to say a prayer. Wishing you were there. And I'm still waiting
english.segment5: You told me once. You'd show up. But I fell for that. Before I fell to pieces. Then I woke up. To no one, Just a picture of Jesus. And a house left in pieces
